text: the npe 2015 trade show is held late
last month in Orlando Florida
some 60,000 visitors from 37 countries
attended this show they came to see more
than two thousand exhibitors covering
more than 1 million square feet of floor
space one of the biggest attractions at
the exhibition machines many of the
machines turning out real plastic
products from real molten resin right on
the show floor
visitors saw injection molding machines
making bottle caps cups and toys
machines blowing bubbles of polyethylene
to make film extrusion blow molding
equipment making bottles and thermo
forming machines making cup lids and
food trays the machines were loud and it
was hard for the Orange County
Convention Center air conditioners to
keep up with the heat that the equipment
gave off
but MPE 2015 was an opportunity for
attendees to see machines up close and
running and some of the exhibitors
didn't have to pack up the equipment to
take home they were lucky enough to make
a sale at the show and deliver the floor
model to a customer this is Alex Tula
chemical and engineering news scene
correspondent reporting
